text: Musa yi a fala Haruna nun a diine xa naxanye yi fa luxi, Eleyasari nun Itamara, a naxa, “Bogise saraxan naxan luxi, naxan mi ralixi Alatala ma tɛɛn na, ɛ xa na tongo, ɛ yi a don saraxa ganden fɛma. A nama basan buru rate seen10.12 burun nate sena: Lɛbɛnna na a ra naxan burun nagboma ayi.  na. A sariɲan fefe!
